decisions.decision: The honeypot will be bumped up to about 200 ERG before the game starts
decisions.speaker: tmr.erg
decisions.context: Setting the prize amount for the game winner
decisions.quote: I'm going to bump this up to about 200 ERG before it gets going

decisions.decision: GitHub repository will be made public after someone wins the pot
decisions.speaker: tmr.erg
decisions.context: Currently private to prevent cheating by looking at game files
decisions.quote: But as soon as somebody wins my pot, then I'm going to do that

commitments.commitment: Will advertise the game to get more people to participate
commitments.quote: I'm going to try to advertise this a little bit so we can get some people

key_facts.fact: The game costs 10 ERG per game, with three games total, requiring about 30 ERG for perfect play
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: The first game requires finding all five seed words in the correct order to escape the cryopod
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: Game 1 costs 10 ERG for 10 messages, Game 2 costs 10 ERG per death
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: Players need all 15 seed words total to claim the vault coins
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: With 10 people playing all three games, approximately 300 ERG would be added to the pot
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg
